Overview
I have 01 year work experience with Angular, React, React
Native to build web applications and mobile applications.

information System company.
Nguyễn Phi Thủ

cation for Orient Commercial Joint Stock Bank.
- Team size: 02

design UI, support offline mode, release application...

application for Australia customer.
- Team size: 02

get location on Google Map, design UI..
- Technologies: lonic, Angular, NgRx, Firebase, Google Map
API.

my colleagues.
- Team size: 04

design UI.
- Technologies: Angular, Angular Material, NgRx.

tion for Australica customer.
- Team size: 02
- Responsibility: Develop mobile application, handle logic,
design UI, support offline mode.
- Technologies: React, React Native, Redux...
- Available on App Store and CH Play (Medehealth)

on website and mobile application.
- Team size: 04

cation, handle logic, design UI, develop chat feature...
